summary: does anyone remember what Dan and Phil were like before they were famous before the ship wars before the drama? When Dan made a...
body:
does anyone remember what Dan and Phil were like before they were famous before the ship wars before the drama?

When Dan made a parody of Snakes on a plane using pombears

when Phil helped KickthePJ become famous

When Dan and Phil were on BBC Radio 1

when they played Innuendo Bingo

When Dan and Phil actually vlogged and there’s that one cute moment where Phil is walking on the fountain

when dan made relateable “How not to” tutorials

When the April fools devil messages  video meme was a thing


when someone twitted their Easter cooking treats to Gordon Ramsay

“Dil, Tabitha, Dab and Dallion”

BECKY AND JESSICA!!!!!!!!1!!!!!!!!!!!1

When Dan wouldn’t constantly change his twitter picture

The Delia Smith jokes

the one time he made a sponsored video about Work Experience
(“I was a children”)

or the glory that was the Krave challenge trilogy

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: Isnt dan into one direction ? (Or was) Like he make it look like a joke but he does really love them right ? He went to a...
question: Isnt dan into one direction ? (Or was) Like he make it look like a joke but he does really love them right ? He went to a concert and i think sing the songs and stuff? Maybe he is just very curious about all of that(the tinhat) like some humans can be. He shouldnt talk about it in front of people who look up to him but its not that bad to be curious about a popular thing, not like he is making the conspiracies himself
answer: I am not sure how Dan feels about One Direction. I remember him going to the concert with Louise and the other British YouTubers, but since I was never a follower of the band, I never paid attention to what he said about them. As for his comments, I think they were irresponsible, but at the time I doubt anyone could have predicted that people would say Louis’s son was a doll and everything else. I still can’t really defend Dan here completely, but I also don’t feel like I need to. A lot of people in the phandom put him up on a pedistal and then get upset when he doesn’t live up to their expectations or upset at others when they are critical of something he does. I think that’s all counterproductive and unfair. He’s a human who makes mistakes just like the rest of us and that realness is why I started watching him in the first place.

I think that’s all counterproductive and unfair. He’s a human who makes mistakes just like the rest of us and that realness is why I started watching him in the first place.

As for his comments, I think they were irresponsible, but at the time I doubt anyone could have predicted that people would say Louis’s son was a doll and everything else. I still can’t really defend Dan here completely, but I also don’t feel like I need to. A lot of people in the phandom put him up on a pedistal and then get upset when he doesn’t live up to their expectations or upset at others when they are critical of something he does. I think that’s all counterproductive and unfair. He’s a human who makes mistakes just like the rest of us and that realness is why I started watching him in the first place.

I remember him going to the concert with Louise and the other British YouTubers, but since I was never a follower of the band, I never paid attention to what he said about them. blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: That clip made me briefly entertain the idea that he doesn't mind/he WANTS his audience to treat him like some of us do, what do...
question: That clip made me briefly entertain the idea that he doesn't mind/he WANTS his audience to treat him like some of us do, what do you think? was that just a slip up? was that just him being a bit of a hypocrite? what happened there?
answer: I think he was being a bit of a hypocrite, but I also don’t think he was thinking that deeply about what he was saying, just trying to be #relatable to his audience and saying something he knew would get attention. That’s just who Dan is and has always been. I don’t think we can or should read into anything here as far as how he wants to be treated by fans because he didn’t say anything about himself directly and made it very clear he didn’t relate to the 1D band members.

reblog.comment: I think he was being a bit of a hypocrite, but I also don’t think he was thinking that deeply about what he was saying, just trying to be #relatable to his audience and saying something he knew would get attention. That’s just who Dan is and has always been. I don’t think we can or should read into anything here as far as how he wants to be treated by fans because he didn’t say anything about himself directly and made it very clear he didn’t relate to the 1D band members.

trail.content_raw: I think he was being a bit of a hypocrite, but I also don’t think he was thinking that deeply about what he was saying, just trying to be #relatable to his audience and saying something he knew would get attention. That’s just who Dan is and has always been. I don’t think we can or should read into anything here as far as how he wants to be treated by fans because he didn’t say anything about himself directly and made it very clear he didn’t relate to the 1D band members.

That’s just who Dan is and has always been. I don’t think we can or should read into anything here as far as how he wants to be treated by fans because he didn’t say anything about himself directly and made it very clear he didn’t relate to the 1D band members.

blog.name: itsbycallapie
blog.title: jericho
blog.description:
i write fanfiction

@itsbycallapie

body:
𝕕𝕒𝕟 𝕙𝕠𝕨𝕖𝕝𝕝 𝕗𝕝𝕦𝕗𝕗 [𝕒 𝕥𝕚𝕣𝕚𝕟𝕘 𝕟𝕚𝕘𝕙𝕥]

I opened the door quickly, pulling Dan in behind me. We laughed as we sprinted up the stairs, our bags flying behind us.

As I arrived at the kitchen door, I pushed it open and set our bags on the counter.

“Oh, my God, Y/N, we didn’t shut the door.” Dan facepalmed as he walked in shame to the front door, returning only moments later. “We really need to work on that, don’t we?” He chuckled quietly to himself.

“Only if we’re being honest,” I retorted, secretly accepting that we do have a problem.

“Shall we go upstairs?” Dan suggested with an over-exaggerated wink, nudging my arm slightly. I nodded before giggling and searching for our bedroom door through the darkness. Feeling the slight engravings in the wood, I found my way to the doorknob before grabbing Dan and making my way inside.

Dan pushed me lightly onto the bed, climbing quietly on top of me. “I love you so, so much,” he whispered, “You really deserve the world.” I smiled. “And trust me, one day, I’ll give it to you.”

Me, being way too emotional, a tear rolled down my cheek. Dan leaned down and kissed it away before lightly moving to my lips. The calm, delicate kiss became hungered like a lion feasting on its prey within seconds. Dan’s hands moved slowly from my cheeks and roamed my body before stationing at my hips, gripping them tightly.

“Is this okay?” Dan whispered onto my neck, “Because, I mean, if it isn’t we can totally stop. It’s not like either of us need this and if you think you don’t want it-”

“Yes, of course, it’s okay, Daniel.” I laughed a bit.

“Good.”

His large hands moved to the first button of my blouse, unbuttoning it agonizingly slowly. I pushed his hands away and unbuttoned it for him, eager to get started.

After I had finished I reached down to the seam of his tee shirt, pulling it over his flawless shoulders. I stopped, admiring his toned chest and light abs, before letting my fingers drop to the hem of his grey sweatpants. I pulled them down so they lingered just below his knee as he did the same to me. I had never done anything like this before, but I loved Dan and I felt as if if it didn’t happen now, it couldn’t happen ever. I pulled my shorts the rest of the way off along with my panties, suddenly completely bare under Dan.

Feeling slightly insecure, I nudged him signaling him to finish removing his clothing as well. He did, swiftly, before leaning down and capturing me in a fierce kiss, our tongues only slightly bumping but with more meaning than imaginable. As we pulled apart to admire the other Dan flipped us over so I was on top. I sat lightly on his chest before instinctively checking behind me.

“Oh, my God, Dan. You’re still wearing your fucking shoes,” I inhaled slowly. “Seriously, what a turnoff! How could we not notice?“ I laughed, slightly embarrassed.

"Are you serious, Y/N?” Dan looked over my shoulder at his feet to see his white Vans were still tied neatly. He chuckled to himself before reaching around me and pulling them off. “Imagine how stupid I just looked! Completely naked and I’m still wearing trainers,” he whispered.

“Yeah, pretty stupid. Better now though.” I smiled, looking at Dan again. “Shall we resume?” I leaned down, grazing his lips delicately.

“Wait,” Dan said frantically, pushing me off of him before leaning over to his bedside drawer. He rummaged through it for a few seconds before turning to me, a look of aggravation displayed on his face.

“We don’t have a condom?”

“We don’t have a condom.”

A moment of silence.

“Do you want me to go to CVS and get some? I totally can,” Dan said before pausing, “Not that we need to.”

I breathed out a long sigh. “No. At this point, I just want to sleep. Sorry Babe,” I whispered tiredly before curling into Dan’s chest underneath the blankets. Seriously, everything is trying to be a cockblock.

“Of course that’s okay,” he said soothingly before wrapping his arms around me.

“Oh, and Dan? You remember what you said about giving me the world?”

“Duh, Y/N, that was like twenty minutes ago. What about it?”

“I already have it,” I mumbled, feeling his smile through my hair, pulling us closer together.

“Yes, of course, it’s okay, Daniel.” I laughed a bit.

“Good.”

His large hands moved to the first button of my blouse, unbuttoning it agonizingly slowly. I pushed his hands away and unbuttoned it for him, eager to get started.

After I had finished I reached down to the seam of his tee shirt, pulling it over his flawless shoulders. I stopped, admiring his toned chest and light abs, before letting my fingers drop to the hem of his grey sweatpants. I pulled them down so they lingered just below his knee as he did the same to me. I had never done anything like this before, but I loved Dan and I felt as if if it didn’t happen now, it couldn’t happen ever. I pulled my shorts the rest of the way off along with my panties, suddenly completely bare under Dan.

Feeling slightly insecure, I nudged him signaling him to finish removing his clothing as well. He did, swiftly, before leaning down and capturing me in a fierce kiss, our tongues only slightly bumping but with more meaning than imaginable. As we pulled apart to admire the other Dan flipped us over so I was on top. I sat lightly on his chest before instinctively checking behind me.

“Oh, my God, Dan. You’re still wearing your fucking shoes,” I inhaled slowly. “Seriously, what a turnoff! How could we not notice?“ I laughed, slightly embarrassed.

"Are you serious, Y/N?” Dan looked over my shoulder at his feet to see his white Vans were still tied neatly. He chuckled to himself before reaching around me and pulling them off. “Imagine how stupid I just looked! Completely naked and I’m still wearing trainers,” he whispered.

“Yeah, pretty stupid. Better now though.” I smiled, looking at Dan again. “Shall we resume?” I leaned down, grazing his lips delicately.

“Wait,” Dan said frantically, pushing me off of him before leaning over to his bedside drawer. He rummaged through it for a few seconds before turning to me, a look of aggravation displayed on his face.

“We don’t have a condom?”

“We don’t have a condom.”

A moment of silence.

“Do you want me to go to CVS and get some? I totally can,” Dan said before pausing, “Not that we need to.”

I breathed out a long sigh. “No. At this point, I just want to sleep. Sorry Babe,” I whispered tiredly before curling into Dan’s chest underneath the blankets. Seriously, everything is trying to be a cockblock.

“Of course that’s okay,” he said soothingly before wrapping his arms around me.

“Oh, and Dan? You remember what you said about giving me the world?”

“Duh, Y/N, that was like twenty minutes ago. What about it?”

“I already have it,” I mumbled, feeling his smile through my hair, pulling us closer together.

blog.name: thedemonphanti
blog.title: thedemonphanti
blog.description: Treat People With Respect | Unpopular Opinions Welcome

summary: Ok i know this is a stupid question to ask you but don't you think they would be the cutest if they were together ? I cant...
question: Ok i know this is a stupid question to ask you but don't you think they would be the cutest if they were together ? I cant imagine how anyone who are kind of into them/one of them cant see how good they'll fit together ?? But anyone bestfriend will be kind of a soulmate, i do think the only difference between friendship and "romantic love" is sexual attraction, thought i'm probably not thinking enough about it and completly wrong
answer:
I mean not casual friendship but when you really have a bestfriend i think its similar to romantic love

No really sorry its a stupid question to ask you of all persons idk why i asked that lol

———

First of all, the reason I have this blog at this point is because I like answering questions, so please don’t ever feel afraid to or sorry for sending me an ask. Second, this isn’t a stupid question at all - it’s actually a really great question that I don’t think I’ve answered one like it on here in a long time.

I think shipping in a real person fandom and a fandom centered around works of fiction are very different. For example, I watch Game of Thrones (although I’m not involved in the fandom) and consider myself “anti” JonSa (I think that’s what it’s called), which is the ship for Jon Snow and Sansa Stark. GoT is a fictional work and Jon and Sansa are characters, so I have no problem saying I think that is an awful ship and if they end up together in the end, I will be annoyed. On the other hand, Dan and Phil are real people, who I like and wish well. If Dan posted a video today and said, “Phil and I are involved in a romantic relationship and I’m really happy,” my reaction would be, “Wow, that’s great, I’m so happy for you!” Unless he was dating someone I absolutely hated, I would have the same reaction to him saying he was happily in a relationship with any person.

The idea of Dan and Phil being involved romantically or sexually doesn’t appeal to me in any emotional or sexual way like it does to some people, but it also doesn’t repulse me or anger me. There was a time when I was curious about Dan’s sexuality, when I first started interacting with the phandom, but otherwise it’s just not something that I spend time thinking about, worrying about, or trying to figure out. The one thing I can say for sure is that he’s not sleeping with me, so whatever he does in his private life is just none of my business because it really doesn’t have to have any effect on my life (it affects some people because they choose to let it and thats entirely on them). In fact, I actually enjoy watching his content a lot more without all of that noise because then I’m just focusing on the video itself and not filled with anxiety, trying to pick apart everything he says of trying to predict how others will interpret it. I feel the same when it comes to joint content.

I’m an “anti” is because I think shipping in the phandom often crosses the line into tinhatting. We don’t know Dan and Phil. We interact with their personas via content they put out on social media. Until Dan and Phil explicitly state their sexualities and relationship statuses, saying that they are gay/straight/bi/queer and/or in a relationship is perpetuating a conspiracy theory. Saying that Dan and Phil are dropping hints or trying to communicate with us covertly in any way is using one of the staple rationalizations that any conspiracy theorists use to try to back up their claims and justify the lengths they go to. Shipping doesn’t need to involve conspiracy theories; many shippers in many fandoms just like the idea of a pairing and hope it is real or becomes real and leave it at that. It becomes tinhatting when you start believing something that hasn’t been confirmed is real and trying to prove it to yourself and other people and it leads to entitlement, stalking, objectification, sexual harassment, accusations and aggression towards those who are shipped and the people around them, and a lot of other negative stuff, all of which I am firmly against. I also think there are some issues with how “phan” is portrayed, romanticizing codependency, and things like that, but the main reason I’m an anti is the tinhatting. I think the most important thing any of can do to support Dan and Phil is to respect their privacy and their rights to define themselves how they want in and in their own words.

Hopefully this answers your questions somewhat clearly. Feel free to send me any follow-up questions. I have such a hard time cutting down all the things I want to say to an appropriate length for tumblr and was trying hard to here, so I didn’t really get a chance to touch on it in the rest of my reply, but I definitely agree that there are more types of love than just romantic or sexual love and all should be celebrated equally!

reblog.comment:
I mean not casual friendship but when you really have a bestfriend i think its similar to romantic love

No really sorry its a stupid question to ask you of all persons idk why i asked that lol

blog.description:
"Now that you’re dead, what are you gonna do with your life?"

"The infinite amount of possibilities scare you, don't they? Don't worry, they scare me too."

"Seems like the whole damn world's really lost it's mind. And all my childhood heroes have fallen off or died."

Never feel like you have no one to talk to. I'm always here for all of you. You're never going to bother me. Ever.
